[Cremate Undead](/Feats.aspx?ID=288) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 124 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

---

Your positive energy sets undead alight. When you use a [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) spell to damage undead, each undead that takes damage also takes persistent fire damage equal to the spell’s level.
